Indian Economy.title: Rupee’s fall: What it means for you and what you can do to de-risk
Indian Economy.summary: ‘In an economy, it is the consumer or the household who are the largest importer,’ said Anindya Banerjee, head of currency and commodities at Kotak Securities. This means that a depreciating rupee has a direct impact on the Indian consumer

Indian Economy.title: Sardar Patel’s legacy echoes in PM’s call for Aatmanirbhar, Viksit Bharat: V-P Radhakrishnan
Indian Economy.summary: Rashtriya Ekta Padyatra, organised to celebrate Sardar Patel's 150th birth anniversary, concludes on its 11th day in Anand's Karamsad, known as Patel's 'karmabhoomi', after covering a distance of 152 km

Indian Economy.title: RBI did its part, now time for markets to show maturity: SBI report
Indian Economy.summary: The RBI monetary policy committee unanimously voted to cut the repo rate by 25 bps amid uncertainties in a tumultuous global order and the RBI panel also maintained its neutral stance

Indian Economy.title: Fall in inflation prepares the ground for rate cut
Indian Economy.summary: Also, the MPC pares the rates on likely near-term softening in GDP growth on account of external uncertainties

Indian Economy.title: Ratan Khatri: The Matka King who architected a million-dollar betting syndicate
Indian Economy.summary: A shadow economy built on matka made a few rich while devastating countless lives, with the understated Ratan Khatri at its core.

Stock Market.title: Index Outlook: Nifty 50, Sensex, Nifty Bank bounce off supports
Stock Market.summary: Nifty, Sensex, and Nifty Bank indices show resilience, maintaining an overall bullish outlook despite recent dips.

Stock Market.title: Nifty and Bank Nifty Prediction for the week  08 Dec’25 to 12 Dec’25 by BL GURU
Stock Market.summary: BL GURU’s Nifty and Bank Nifty outlook for Dec 8–12, 2025. Nifty eyes 26,900 on breakout above 26,350, while Bank Nifty targets 62,000 with key supports in focus.

Stock Market.title: F&O Tracker: Support cushions index futures
Stock Market.summary: Nifty futures show bullish bias, with key resistance at 26,500; Nifty Bank futures indicate potential for upward movement.

Stock Market.title: Mutual funds’ investment in equity markets doubles to ₹43,465 cr on strong inflows
Stock Market.summary: Mutual funds double equity investments to ₹43,465 crore amid strong inflows, marking five consecutive years of positive equity flows.

Stock Market.title: Mastering Derivatives: Stop-loss for options trading
Stock Market.summary: Learn how to effectively apply stop-loss strategies for options trading using underlying price charts for optimal results.

Banking & Finance.title: BoB, Bank of India cut repo-linked interest rate after RBI’s policy rate cut, others to follow suit
Banking & Finance.summary: With cheaper funding, banks can lower lending rates such as MCLR and base rates, making home, auto, and business loans more affordable

Banking & Finance.title: ICRA expects extended policy rate pause, unless economic growth moderates
Banking & Finance.summary: ICRA expects the rate cut cycle to have come to an end. "Any further rate easing would only be likely if there is a material downward undershooting in growth outcomes, which leads to a cut in growth projections," the ICRA report read.

Banking & Finance.summary: Explore the yield curve's significance in predicting interest rates, inflation, and economic trends for informed investment decisions.

Technology Sector.summary: The court held that Danish pharma giant Novo Nordisk had obtained two separate patents for the same compound

Technology Sector.title: ‘India is very funny country’: Foreign traveller captures calf riding in auto; viral video leaves internet amused
Technology Sector.summary: From his moving autorickshaw, Pablo Garcia captured a quirky sight – a calf standing peacefully inside another autorickshaw, blending into the traffic as casually as any regular passenger.
